Class DetailView

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization.svg.SVGPlot
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization.gui.VisualizationPlot
        • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization.gui.detail.DetailView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ResultListener, VisualizationListener, EventListener

    public class DetailView
extends VisualizationPlot
implements ResultListener, VisualizationListener
    Manages a detail view.
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
